text: Money doesn't make you happy. I now have $50 million but I was just as happy when I had $48 million.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

text: A system of capitalism presumes sound money, not fiat money manipulated by a central bank. Capitalism cherishes voluntary contracts and interest rates that are determined by savings, not credit creation by a central bank.
author: Ron Paul

text: Money demands that you sell, not your weakness to men's stupidity, but your talent to their reason.
author: Ayn Rand

text: When it is a question of money, everybody is of the same religion.
author: Voltaire

text: Money is like an arm or leg - use it or lose it.
author: Henry Ford
